newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: Yields fall on 91-day Lithuanian T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Yields fall on 91-day Lithuanian T-bills.

text.p: Yields fell on 91-day Lithuanian Treasury bills on Monday and all of the 50 million litas issue was sold as it was oversubscribed, the country's central bank said.
The average yield was 9.21 percent, down from the 9.37 percent offered to buyers at the last auction for 91-day paper on May 19.
The settlement date for the issue is May 29 and the bills mature on August 28.
All figures in millions of litas unless otherwise indicated.
